CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( IP_AlternativeContact__r.FirstName ), IP_Original_Inventor_Name__r.FirstName + " " + IP_Original_Inventor_Name__r.LastName, IP_AlternativeContact__r.FirstName + " " + IP_AlternativeContact__r.LastName )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The current active inventor name. By default this will be the original inventor although should an alternative distribution be defined, then that name will override.
CustomField.label: Inventor
